title: Ten years after Hugo Chávez's death, Venezuelans want Maduro to do ‘better’
description: As Venezuelans mark a decade since the death of the late Hugo Chávez, they find themselves in a country that has largely fallen apart.

title: Between the U.S. and Cuba, more cultural exchanges and engagement signal modest shift in policy
description: More cultural exchanges and engagement between the U.S. and Cuba signal a change in tone of the relationship.

title: Two Americans kidnapped in Mexico found dead, two others alive
description: The governor of the Mexican state of Tamaulipas said two of the U.S. citizens kidnapped last week have been found dead, adding that two others are alive. NBC News’ Ken Dilanian and retired FBI agent Rob D’Amico have the details.

title: Activists urge human rights court to condemn El Salvador’s abortion ban
description: Women’s rights activists called for the Inter-American Court of Human Rights to condemn El Salvador following the death of a high-risk pregnant woman.

title: U.S. citizen convicted in journalist’s hostage-taking in Somalia
description: Two men, including a U.S. citizen, have been convicted of helping Somali pirates who kidnapped a U.S. journalist for ransom and held him for 2 1/2 years, prosecutors said.

title: Video shows apparent execution of unarmed, smoking Ukrainian soldier
description: Ukraine has vowed to track down the Russian soldiers it said killed an unarmed prisoner of war after a graphic video appearing to show the incident surged across social media and fueled public outrage.

title: Search underway for Americans kidnapped in Mexico as relatives plead for their safe return
description: Authorities were searching Tuesday for four Americans who were shot at by gunmen and kidnapped shortly after crossing the border into Northern Mexico last week, as more information about the victims comes to light.

title: Conflict with China is inevitable unless U.S. changes course, Beijing's new foreign minister warns
description: China’s new foreign minister, Qin Gang, warned Tuesday that the United States risks “confrontation and conflict” if it does not adjust its policy toward China.

title: Japan’s new rocket fails on debut flight, in blow to space ambitions
description: Japan’s new medium-lift rocket failed on its debut flight in space on Tuesday after the launcher’s second-stage engine did not ignite as planned.

title: North Korea warns U.S. against shooting down missile tests
description: North Korea said Tuesday that any move by the United States to shoot down one of its test missiles would be considered a declaration of war.
